Articles.Content:
Vininator\'s Wacky Shipyard of Galactic Shenanigans!

Hi there! I\'ve been with this project since 0.14, and I\'ve been experimenting with 'interesting' designs. So far I have a VTOL jet, a few successful regular rockets, and a... thing. I call it FIDO. It\'s fun.

<< SHIP DESIGNS AND FUNNIES TO BE POSTED SOON! >>
